article_title: Grant Wilson Leaves Goldman Sachs for Etrading Software
article_text:
Grant Wilson, a senior credit-trading executive at Goldman Sachs Group Inc., in London, has joined Etrading Software Ltd., the consultancy working on a new network for bond traders called “Neptune.”

Mr. Wilson started April 2, according to people familiar with the matter, and will be focused on a series of projects, including Neptune, which is aiming to give traders an alternative channel to Bloomberg LP terminals for negotiating...
